name: first_achievements
description: Look at he achievement list in the main menu.

name: win_game_modes
description: Win online or custom game with both digital and board game rules.

name: first_tutorial
description: Complete the tutorial.

name: finish_game
description: Finish your first game.

name: win_game
description: Win a game.

name: win_game_numbers
description: Win online or custom game with two, three and four players.

name: finish_pass_and_play
description: Finish a pass & play game.

name: first_wonder
description: Complete a wonder.

name: first_government_peaceful
description: Change your government peacefully.

name: first_government_revolution
description: Change your government by revolution.

name: first_age_3_urban
description: Build an Age III urban building.

name: first_colony
description: Colonize territory.

name: first_aggression
description: Play a successful aggression.

name: first_war_victory
description: Declare and win a war.

name: first_aggression_lost
description: Fail to defend against an aggression.

name: first_war_defeat
description: Lose a war.

name: first_accepted_pact
description: Propose a pact that another player accepts.

name: first_pact_breaking
description: Make an attack that cancels a pact between you and your rival.

name: first_impact_won
description: Score more points than other players when evaluating you and your rival.

name: first_warnings
description: Get five different warnings on a single attempt to end a turn.

name: first_victory_with_beatings
displayName: Lost a Battle, Win the Game
description: Win an online or custom game in which you lost at least one war and one aggression.

name: first_scoring_victory
description: Win a three- or four-player custom or online game, despite being last before final event evaluation.

name: triplet_russian
description: Be Russian. Be Soviet. Be Trans-Siberian. Win that game.

name: triplet_american
description: Democracy. Hamburgers. Superbowl. Victory!

name: triplet_french
description: Utilize a French visisonary, a French revolutionary, and a French genius. Win that game.

name: triplet_horde
description: Choose a leader. Fortify your territory. Raid your neighbours. Win.

name: triplet_classic
description: Be a medieval naval power. Make a famous artist paint a famous ceiling. Win with style.

name: triplet_britain
description: A great British artist. A great British statesman. The biggest commonwealth. Victory. A cup of tea.

name: triplet_alexander
description: Find two ways to pay tribute to Alexander the Great ... and one to Alexandre Dumas. Win that game.

name: triplet_india
description: A beautiful monument, a famous leader ... and an impressive population! Oh... and victory.

name: triplet_20th
description: Initiate three wars (two of them real). Win the game.

name: completion_triplets
description: Accomplish all Historical Triplets achievements from the base game.

name: first_online_start
description: Start an online game.

name: first_online_end
description: Finish an online game.

name: first_online_win
description: Win an online game.

name: tta_online_rank_2
description: Reach rank 2 online.

name: tta_online_rank_5
description: Reach rank 5 online.

name: tta_online_rank_10
description: Reach rank 10 online.

name: tta_online_rank_15
description: Reach rank 15 online.

name: tta_online_rank_20
description: Reach rank 20 online.

name: tta_online_rank_25
description: Reach rank 25 online.

name: tta_online_rank_30
description: Reach rank 30 online.

name: online_games
description: Finish at least 50 games online.

name: online_different_players
description: Defeat at least 20 different players online.

name: online_simultaneous
description: Have at least five or more online games going at the same time.

name: online_live
description: Finish an online game within 24 hours.

name: online_3_row_wins
description: Win 3 online games in a row.

name: online_6_row_wins
description: Win 6 online games in a row.

name: challenge_white
description: Win a white or green difficulty challenge.

name: challenge_yellow
description: Win a yellow or orange difficulty challenge.

name: challenge_red
description: Win a red or purple difficulty challenge.

name: challenges_all_green
description: Win all original white and green difficulty challenges.

name: challenges_all_orange
description: Win all original yellow and orange difficulty challenges.

name: challenges_all_purple
description: Win all original red and purple difficulty challenges.

name: challenges_max_domination
description: Score a domination of 111 or more in a challenge.

name: challenges_max_domination2
description: Score a domination of 222 or more in a challenge.

name: challenges_total_domination
description: Score a domination of 2222 or more in original challenges.

name: challenges_total_domination2
description: Score a domination of 3333 or more in original challenges.

name: feat_game_score
description: Score at least 300 culture in a game. (Feats cannot be achieved in most challenges.)

name: feat_game_difference
description: Win a game by at least 150 culture points.

name: feat_all_wonders
description: Win games with all the base game wonders.

name: feat_all_leaders
description: Win games with every base game leader.

name: feat_all_tactics
description: Win wars with every base game tactic.

name: feat_game_wonders
description: Build 7 wonders in a single game.

name: feat_hollywood
description: Score 50 or more points when completing the Hollywood wonder.

name: feat_internet
description: Scored 45 or more points when completing the Internet wonder.

name: feat_space_flight
description: Score 40 or more points when completing Space Flight wonder.

name: feat_fast_food
description: Score 35 or more points for completing the Fast Food Chains wonder.

name: feat_big_culture
description: Win a game with a culture rating of 30 or more.

name: feat_big_science
description: Win a game with science rating of 30 or more.

name: feat_big_economy
description: Win a game with combined food and resources production of 50 or more.

name: feat_double_gov
description: Establish the same government twice in a single game. Still win.

name: feat_total_war
description: Win a war with a strength advantage of 50 or more.

name: feat_uneven_war
description: Win a war against Age III units using only Age A or I units.

name: feat_no_culture
description: Win a game where your culture rating was zero all the time.

name: completion_feats
description: Accomplish all base game Feats.

name: n_wonders
description: Complete 100 wonders.

name: n_techs
description: Develop 500 technologies.

name: n_people
description: Increase population 700 times.

name: n_actions
description: Play 333 action cards.

name: n_events
description: Prepare 300 events.

name: n_colonies
description: Colonize 80 territories.

name: n_pacts
description: Conclude 40 pacts.

name: n_aggressions
description: Lead 60 successful aggressions.

name: n_wars
description: Win war with a total strength advantage of 666.

name: completion_devotion
description: Accomplish all other Devotion achievements.

name: first_wonder_exp
description: Complete a wonder from the expansion.

name: first_victory_with_exp
description: Win a game in which, for each age, you have a wonder and a leader from the expanion.

name: first_victory_with_mix
description: Win a mixed game in which you have exactly two leaders and two wonders from both the expansion and the base game.

name: first_victory_with_female
description: Win a game in which you have four leaders, all women.

name: first_fleming_aggression
description: Play a successful aggression right after you look at the military cards of the target player.

name: first_hybrid_uprising
description: Win a Hybrid War that causes you to have an uprising.

name: triplet_caesar
description: Pave the road for your legions. Lead them to a surprising attack. Win that battle, and the game.

name: triplet_boom
description: Arm your peasants with firearms. Make a boom. Make an ultimate victorious boom!

name: triplet_medicine
description: Invent medicine. Invent a great diagnostic machine. Heal everyone. And still manage to win.

name: triplet_american_wonders
description: Build one native, one imported, and one truly prestigious American wonder. Win the game.

name: triplet_germans
description: Let three German leaders contribute to your victorious cultural heritage.

name: triplet_africa
description: An ancient ruler. An industrial wonder. A modern activist. All from the same continent. Victory.

name: triplet_spain
description: Build an army ready for conquests. Invest a lot into exploring. Invest a lot into architecture. Win.

name: triplet_apple
description: Grow two hanging apples. Let one inspire a theory. Take a bite from the other and make it a symbol. Win.

name: triplet_samurai
description: Defend the castle with seven samurai. Let one die. Put that heroic tale (and your victory) in celluloid.

name: completion_triplets_exp
description: Accomplish all Historical Triplets achievements, both from the base game and the expansion.

name: online_all_types
description: Finish at least online game for each setting: Base Game, Expansion, and Random Mix.

name: online_expansion_games
description: Win 30 online games with Expansion or Random Mix settings.

name: challenges_all_green_all
description: Win all white and green difficulty challenges.

name: challenges_all_orange_all
description: Win all yellow and orange difficulty challenges.

name: challenges_all_purple_all
description: Win all red and purple difficulty challenges.

name: challenge_all_types
description: Win at least one challenge of each color on each page of challenges.

name: challenges_total_domination_exp
description: Score a total domination of 2444 in expansion challenges.

name: challenges_total_domination2_exp
description: Score a total domination of 3666 in expansion challenges.

name: challenges_total_domination_mix
description: Score a total domination of 2666 in mixed challenges.

name: challenges_total_domination2_mix
description: Score a total domination of 3999 in mixed challenges.

name: challenges_total_domination_all
description: Score a total domination of 8888 in challenges of all types.

name: challenges_total_domination2_all
description: Score a total domination of 13333 in challenges of all types.

name: feat_all_wonders_exp
description: Win games with all the wonders from the base game and the expansion.

name: feat_all_leaders_exp
description: Win games with every leader from the base game and the expansion.

name: feat_all_tactics_exp
description: Win wars with every tactic. Do not forget about Sun Tzu.

name: feat_empire_state
description: Score 45 points when completing the Empire State Building wonder.

name: feat_united_nations
description: Score 38 points more than anyone else when completing the United Nations wonder.

name: feat_red_cross
description: Score 36 or more points for building and completing the Red Cross wonder.

name: feat_manhattan_project
description: Score 40 or more points for completing the Manhattan Project and for using it in wars in one game.

name: feat_colonies
description: During one game, score 50 culture and gain 50 resources for your colonies.

name: feat_reverse_leaders
description: Win a game in which you replace a leader with one from a lower age. Twice.

name: completion_feats_exp
description: Accomplish all Feats, both from the base game and the expansion.
